Have Six Save Slots (Press DPad Left/Right) [Ralf]

042D2E54 4BD38CFD
0430B314 4BD00858
0430B354 4BD00830
0430C0EC 4BCFFAA4
E2000001 80008000

DPad Left  = Switch to Slots 1-4
DPad Right = Switch to Slots 5-6 (Temp Slots 1-2)

Have Six Save Slots v2 (Press Y To Toggle Slots) [Ralf]

DPad Left  = Switch to Slots 1-4
DPad Right = Switch to Slots 5-7 (Temp Slots 1-3)

Common Bank (Hold L And Open Bank) [Ralf]
201FFBFC 7C7F1B78
0600BAB4 0000009C

E2000001 80008000

Common Bank = Slot 7 Bank (Temp Slot 3 Bank)

Bank Selector (Hold DPad Up/Down/Left/Right And Open Bank) [Ralf]
201FFBFC 7C7F1B78
0600BAB0 000000A0
800D8EB8 28000001
40820074 3C808051
808493B0 70800010
4182000C 38A00000
48000030 70800040
4182000C 38A00001
48000020 70800020
4182000C 38A00002
48000010 70800080
4182002C 38A00003
80CDB954 7C062840
4182001C 806DB938
28030000 41820010
1CA52798 38A50420
7C632A14 3C808001
9064C32C 28030000
482047B4 800D8EB8
28000001 4082000C
3C608001 8063C32C
7C681B79 48204724
0421026C 4BDFB8C8
042102E0 4BDFB7D0
E2000001 80008000

DPad Up    - Slot 1 Bank
DPad Left  - Slot 2 Bank
DPad Down  - Slot 3 Bank
DPad Right - Slot 4 Bank

Bank Selector v2 (Hold L + DPad Up/Down/Left/Right And Open Bank) [Ralf]
201FFBFC 7C7F1B78
0600BAA0 000000B0
800D8EB8 28000001
40820084 3C808051
808493B0 70800010
4182000C 38A00000
48000034 70800040
4182000C 38A00001
48000024 70800020
4182000C 38A00002
48000014 70800080
4182003C 38A00003
48000010 74800002
41820008 38A50004
80CDB954 7C062840
4182001C 806DB938
28030000 41820010
1CA52798 38A50420
7C632A14 3C808001
9064C32C 28030000
482047B4 800D8EB8
28000001 4082000C
3C608001 8063C32C
7C681B79 48204724
0421026C 4BDFB8C8
042102E0 4BDFB7C0
E2000001 80008000

DPad Up        - Slot 1 Bank
DPad Left      - Slot 2 Bank
DPad Down      - Slot 3 Bank
DPad Right     - Slot 4 Bank

L + DPad Up    - Slot 5 Bank (Temp Slot 1 Bank)
L + DPad Left  - Slot 6 Bank (Temp Slot 2 Bank)
L + DPad Down  - Slot 7 Bank (Temp Slot 3 Bank)
